publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3295 Ross Finnie: Support Renfrewshire Faitrade Zone Campaign—That the Parliament supports the campaign to gain Fairtrade zone status for Renfrewshire, following its application, and notes that Renfrewshire’s campaign won the Fairtrade Foundations Outstanding Achievement Award at the 2008 Fairtrade Fortnight Awards.

S3M-3295 Support Renfrewshire Faitrade Zone Campaign (lodged on 23 January 2009) Mike Pringle*, Patricia Ferguson*, Bill Wilson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Jim Tolson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Bill Butler*
S3M-3295 Support Renfrewshire Faitrade Zone Campaign (lodged on 23 January 2009) Patrick Harvie*, Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*, Trish Godman*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-3295 Support Renfrewshire Faitrade Zone Campaign (lodged on 23 January 2009) Jack McConnell*
